sentences.sContent: Critics claim his management has become too authoritarian.
sentences.sCn: 批评者称他的管理变得过于专制。

synos.tran: 权力主义者；独裁主义者

trans.tranCn: 独裁主义的；权力主义的
trans.tranOther: strictly forcing people to obey a set of rules or laws, especially ones that are wrong or unfair

trans.tranCn: 权力主义者；独裁主义者
